title: Aptos exec sees Web 2.5 platforms earning tons of revenue
summary: Aptos' head of ecosystem, Ash Pampati, said the catalyst for broader user adoption will be something new, rather of recreating memecoins or NFTs.

title: Watch these Bitcoin price levels as BTC meets decision point
summary: Bitcoin price is in a tug-of-war between the bulls and bears, with big overhead resistance at $98,000 in place and several key support levels below.

title: Tether AI platform to support Bitcoin and USDT payments, CEO says
summary: Tether AIs crypto payment support will be enabled via a newly launched wallet development kit that enables self-custodial wallets for Bitcoin and Tether's USDt.

title: Vitalik Buterin says rollups must prove security before decentralizing
summary: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin said rollups should decentralize only when proof systems are strong enough to make centralization the greater risk.
